alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 5:50AM AKST until November 23 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Susitna Valley. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow tonight will transition to a wintry mix Thursday morning with a mix of freezing rain and snow in the lower elevations from Talkeetna south along the Parks Highway.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
